title: Star Wars: Jedi Quest - Path to Truth
description: As twelve-year-old Anakin Skywalker becomes a star apprentice at the Jedi Temple, his Jedi Master worries about Anakin's darker nature, but when they must embark on a dangerous mission to destroy a brutal space pirate who is linked to Anakin's past, Anakin's Jedi prowess foreshadows the darkness that beckons him.
author: Jude Watson
